data.title: Find destination
data.statement:
You are driving a car to go to a destination .So while driving you will need to go sometimes forward some times right some times left
Dont worry ; There is NO GOING BACK
 
you will get a string of the road containing three symbols ("L"  ,  "R" , " -.")
{{"L"}} : means you need to turn left
{{"R"}} : means you need to turn right
{{"-"}} : means you need to go forward 

each "-" is a block

testCases.title: Example
testCases.testOut:
Go 4 blocks Forward
Turn Right
Go 2 blocks Forward
Turn Right
Go 1 blocks Forward
Turn Left
You've reached your destination

data.constraints: [[R]] is always a valid string of instruction and will not be empty or contain any invalid characters.

write You've reached your destination
data.outputDescription: <<[[N]] lines:>> Each line is a string for the next action ([[N]] is the total number of actions).

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

You are driving a car to go to a destination .So while driving you will need to go sometimes forward some times right some times left
Dont worry ; There is NO GOING BACK

you will get a string of the road containing three symbols ("L" , "R" , " -.")
"L" : means you need to turn left
"R" : means you need to turn right
"-" : means you need to go forward

each "-" is a block
Input
a string R showing the road
Output
N lines: Each line is a string for the next action (N is the total number of actions).
Constraints
R is always a valid string of instruction and will not be empty or contain any invalid characters.
Example
Input
----R--R-L
Output
Go 4 blocks Forward
Turn Right
Go 2 blocks Forward
Turn Right
Go 1 blocks Forward
Turn Left
You've reached your destination
